name: Feathery Flight
description:
A small game based on an ML-agents course from Udemy

Basically, you are a mother bird who has spotted another bird trying to snatch your eggs,  so then you have to get to your nest first to ward off the other bird. 

Does it make sense? No! Am I okay with it? Yes

Currently, there is only 1 map (Olive tropical forest), there will be more features and stuff coming to the game (if I update the game that is).

Known bugs:

  • The second checkpoint has to be passed 2 times.
  • The game for some reason can't be played two times in one session (I have no idea why).

Windows download here
